title: Modular Mountain Bike Rider, Biker
description: Unleash the thrill of mountain biking in your projects with the Modular Mountain Bike Rider. Customize every detail for ultimate realism. The perfect asset for adrenaline-pumping gaming experiences!
longDescription: Introducing the Modular Mountain Bike Rider asset for Unreal Engine! Dive into the adrenaline-fueled world of extreme sports with this highly customizable character model. Whether you're building a thrilling downhill racing game or an adventurous mountain biking simulator, our modular rider offers unparalleled versatility. With interchangeable parts for helmets, goggles, glasses, facial hair, create your own unique rider to conquer any terrain.
technicalDetails:
DEMO: https://drive.google.com/file/d/15bSRn2nyF7I0qCwxB5bpoTMYb4pf3dic/view?usp=sharing

Demo Video: https://youtu.be/vN8ikcNVfPA


Features: Modular clothes and gear

  • Customization example level (check demo)
  • 2 Types of helmets (Full face and Shell + 4 color schemes for each)
  • 2 Types of Eye wear (Goggles and Sport glasses + 4 color schemes for each)
  • 4 Types of Tops (Hoodie, Shirt, 2 Jerseys)
  • 3 Types of Pants (Cargo pants, Bike pants, Jeans)
  • Gloves
  • Flat shoes
  • Knee pads
  • Adjustable Dirt accumulation


Every item is configurable from single data table.

Dirt accumulation is controllable from single material parameter collection


Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes UE 4 Mannequin, UE 5 Manny retargeter included

Animated: Uses default animation

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: Modular pieces from 340 vertices (knee pads) to 14 800 vertices (hair) Average clothing item around 3000 vertices.

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 5 Materials, 20 Mat. instances

Number of Textures: 29

Texture Resolutions: 4k, 2k, 1k

Supports Lumen


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: No
